subSections.title: Kanji
subSections.text: {{ja-kanji|grade=3|rs=口05}}

subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
Etymology 1
Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=k|いのち|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR}}

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|いのち}}

# [[life]]
#: {{ja-usex|'''命'''の[[恩人]]|'''いのち''' の おんじん|person to whom one owes their '''life'''}}
# [[lifespan]]
# [[lifetime]]
# [[fate]], [[destiny]]
# {{lb|ja|sort=いのち|figuratively}} the most [[important]] part or [[aspect]] of a thing

subSections.title: Synonyms
Etymology 2
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|みこと}}
From {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=みこと}}. Compound of {{prefix|ja|sort=みこと|御|tr1=mi|pos1=honorific prefix|言|tr2=koto|t2=word}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref> The ''mi'' prefix is generally limited to extremely high-[[status]] contexts such as [[god]]s or [[emperor]]s.

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=k|みこと|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR}}

subSections.title: Alternative forms
subSections.text: * {{l|ja|御言}}

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|みこと}}

# the [[word]]s or [[pronouncement]]s of a [[god]] or an [[emperor]]

subSections.title: Etymology 3
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|みこと}}
From {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=みこと}}. Originally a compound of {{prefix|ja|sort=みこと|御|tr1=mi|pos1=honorific prefix|事|tr2=koto|t2=abstract thing|pos2=as opposed to {{l|ja|物}}, ''mono'', “concrete thing”}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=k|みこと|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR}}

subSections.title: Noun
Pronoun
Usage notes
subSections.text: Used ironically from the late {{w|Heian period}}, expressing a sense of mild [[derision]] or [[ridicule]].

subSections.title: Etymology 4
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=o|めい}}
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=めい}} {{m|zh|命|tr=mjæng<sup>H</sup>||command}}. Compare modern {{etyl|cmn|-}} {{m|zh|命|tr=mìng||life, destiny, instruction}}.

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=kanon|めい|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR}}

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|めい}}

# [[fate]], [[destiny]]
# [[life]], [[lifespan]]
# [[order]], [[command]]
